history.content: According to https://ls.berkeley.edu/sites/default/files/latechangeclassschedule_fa18_1.pdf it looks like the deadline was Friday before RRR week, but you should talk to your advisor just in case there is something else you can do.

children.subject: Sorry for your mishap man, hope everything goes well for you :)

Thanks for the response. Yes, that ship has sailed, looking at other options now. I hope whoever reads this will be encouraged to double (and triple) check their academic progress and plans with advisors.

history.content: I'm expecting to graduate this semester, and only right now I realized that I might have screwed up my grading options. In the beginning of the semester I went to advising at L&S and asked whether I could take STAT 134 (which I'm taking this semester) for P/NP, and they said that was OK, but I didn't even think that I needed to check in with Major advisor as well and take it for a grade since I want to use that as a tech elective for CS major. Is it possible to change the grading option back to Letter grade at this point?
history.subject: Graduating, screwed up grading options
